state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, you could, like, make an attempt to travel north. If you can get through with that, go to the east. Then, go north. Following that, take a trip north. With that done, head north. With that accomplished, make an attempt to head west. With that over with, try to venture north. And then, make an effort to travel north. That done, go west. Okay, and then, venture south. And then, try to go west. And then, head west. And then, make an effort to head west. With that done, make an attempt to travel west. Following that, recover the coin from the floor of the shower. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Closet =- You arrive in a closet. An ordinary kind of place. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. > -= Closet =-0/1
